title: [Item Concept] Zukshiz's Vouch
body:
>#**Zukshiz's Vouch**#

https://i.pinimg.com/236x/93/77/a6/9377a6116d768665cdefe2d4537d0df4.jpg
(note that this picture is not mine and i do not take any credit for it)

>#**Stats:**
+30 attack damage
+10% cooldown reduction
+300 health
+250 mana

>**Passive**:
*UNIQUE* Passive [Cleave]: Basic attacks deal **5 (+4% bonus health)** additional physical damage and slow by 10% for 0.4 seconds all targets in an arc in front of the champion (275 radius).

*UNIQUE* Passive [Blood Thirsty]: After using an ability, the next basic attack within 4 seconds deals damage to enemies in a larger arc (375 radius) and heals for **4% of missing health** (4 second cooldown).

>**Active**:
*UNIQUE* Active [Claw's Grip]: Next basic attack will deal **100% of base attack damage** as bonus physical damage, slow the enemy by 99% for 0.25 seconds and heal for **50% damage dealt** (only from basic attack, doesn't count bonuses from actives, buffs and abilities) (20 second cooldown).


>#**Build Path:**

{{item:3057}} **+** {{item:3052}} **+** {{item:3077}}
 1 050 + 1 200  + 1 200 + 250 = 3700 total gold


Why would this work?

Its another version of Hydras that work for tanks and juggernauts that spam abilities or/and have profits from this item and have life steal. It also slows down opponents, not allowing them to escape your grip. Helps with farming and great for 1v1s and 2v1s. It's possible to cancel channels with the active. Gives sustain in the battle and scales well with health. It would work excellently on {{champion:39}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:83}}

replies.body:
Change one of the passive names to "Spellblade" so it can't be stacked with other Sheen items without losing a little effectiveness.

As for balance, I'm a mage guy, so I can't really say how strong this would be (though the tenacity and healing increase seems a bit excessive).
It still stacks with other Sheen items, because it has a different name for the passive.
You want it to stack?  I think that would result in far too much damage without losing so much defense.

this is pretty nuts

plus it wouldn't be good on morde/riven/renekton/shyv since they are manaless. 

this would be pretty must-buy on every juggernaut ever and allow them to win in situations where they shouldn't, especially that first passive. there's like three distinct effects here that are all powerful on their own, all stacked on a gold-efficient item. the combine cost is also egregiously low. i'm not even counting the active effect, which breaks a lot of league rules (hard cc on an item effect is not allowed)

also that name is pretty ugly; 'vouch' isn't a noun. since this is a tiamat item, it should end in hydra with a spunky adjective in front. maybe 'grasping hydra' or something like that. 

i suggest cutting the cdr and the first and second passive entirely and upping the health to 350 or 400. keep the cleave effect based on health and add a slow to the sheen effect. create a new active, one that doesn't do a ridiculous amount of damage or stun the target. maybe a health siphon in a cone like morde e to keep the healing identity.

Oh well, the name can't be changed (i use google translate, and it says it's a noun, what could i do), but thanks for suggestions, i'm going to change it a bit now.

Edit: Twinkled with the passives a bit and increased the total gold cost to 3700 from 3600. Hope it is a bit balanced now.
